counter.balance

及物动词
1 [用…]使…平衡,使…相称[with]
The two weights ~ each other.
那两个秤锤互成平衡
2 [用…]抵消…的效果;

[用…]补充…的不足,弥补[with]
A marathon runner ~s lack of speed with endurance.
